concept.title: 507.7100 Definitions.

conbody.p: “Category Management” means the business practice of buying common goods and services as an enterprise to eliminate redundancies, increase efficiency, and deliver more value and savings from the Government's acquisition programs.
“Senior Accountable Official” (SAO) means the GSA’s Deputy Administrator.
